_gram:
(but <ab>Atm.</ab> when
used with the instrumental of a
conveyance)
_meanings:
{@--3@} To pass over, be 
transferred to.

{@--6@} To pass
or roam through, travel over.

{@--1@} To cause to go about, lead, 
conduct; {#yUTAni saMcArya#} <ls>Ś. 5. 5.</ls>

{@--3@}
To transmit, communicate, pass
over, deliver over to (as a disease
&c.).

{@--4@} To turn out (as cattle
&c.) to graze.
